<div class="blue-box">
NHSquicker is a free app which provides live wait times for NHS services in Devon, Cornwall and Somerset.

-   Helps people choose the right service for them.

-   Helps relieve the pressure off the NHS.
</div>


**A&E waiting times have increased substantially over recent years.**

NHSquicker was created to guide people to choose the appropriate service for them, steering away from unnecessary visits to A&E departments.
